name: The Last Shelter
description:
Local Co-op Multiplayer about a family of 4 + dog protecting their home from ghosts and outsiders by beating them up with Mom's rolling pin and Dad's magical rod.

Player 1 Move: WASD
Player 2 Move: IJKL
Player 1 Attack: C
Player 2 Attack: full stop aka period

Hints: Keep the family together. Make sure they don't perish.

Game made for Global Game Jam 2019
